snippet: Hiring increased as well, but that’s partly because of a slowdown in worker productivity....
abstract: Labor Dept reports number of job openings climbed modest 2 percent to 5.6 million in June from 5.5 million in May; hiring rose 1.7 percent to 5.1 million.
lead_paragraph: Hiring increased as well, but that’s partly because of a slowdown in worker productivity.

headline.main: U.S. Job Openings Rose in June
headline.print_headline: More Jobs Beckon in U.S.; Hiring Rises
